akn:content.akn:p:
§ 903. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section, Pub. L. 93–197, § 2, Dec. 22, 1973, 87 Stat. 770, which set out definitions, was omitted from the Code as being of special and not general application.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short TitlePub. L. 93–197, § 1, Dec. 22, 1973, 87 Stat. 770, provided that Pub. L. 93–197, enacting this subchapter and repealing sections 891 to 902 of this title, could be cited as the “Menominee Restoration Act”.
